title: Dogecoin Price Could Surge 20% in Near Term, Crypto Analyst Predicts
description: In a forecast that has caught the attention of the expansive cryptocurrency community, a popular digital assets trader believes that Dogecoin ($DOGE) could experience significant growth in the near term. The pseudonymous cryptocurrency analyst, Altcoin Sherpa shared a price prediction with his nearly 200,000 followers on the microblogging platform X that, based on current indicators, [â€¦]
